  nextSmallest([1, 2, 3, 4, 5]) == 2
  nextSmallest([5, 1, 4, 3, 2]) == 2
  nextSmallest([]) == null
  nextSmallest([1, 1]) == null
  */
const nextSmallest = (lst) => {
  if (lst.length === 0) return null
  let min = lst[0]
  let index = 0
  for (let i = 1; i < lst.length; i++) {
    if (lst[i] < min) {
      min = lst[i]
      index = i
    }
  }
  return lst[index + 1]
}
